FK.content: religion & reason develop in tandem, their common resource: testimonial pledge of every performative; same source divides itself, possibility of two, n +1
n + 1 incalculably engenders all supplements: crypt

H.content: “at this very moment”: antinomy of laws in the plural and absolutely singular law
there are 2 plurals, different at same time: 1) multiplicity, plural laws 2) One + a multiplicity, One + n [plus d’un]
One + n, the antinomic addition, adds conditional laws to unconditional law of hospitality

SW.content: unlike veil, tallith is the difference of the event, irreducible reference to the One, the One + n > cannot be or become (like every veil) a figure, symbol, because of the uniqueness of its reference, the untranslatable carry of this ference (which one cannot/must not get rid of)
